about_the_game:
Expand Saki-chan's Soothing Sanctuary with this NSFW DLC !!!!

After tearing up the tracks in a heart-pounding, blood-pumping racing combat, what's a warrior to do? Kick back, unwind, and let Saki-chan relax in her Massage Haven! Here's what awaits in this risqué retreat:

  • Interactive Massage: Use your 5 fingers, a buzzing vibrator, or why not, your very own tentacle to pamper Saki-chan. It's not just a massage; it's an experience!

  • Pose Galore: Discover a smorgasbord of poses to help our beloved Saki-chan find her Zen. Because after all that chaos, she deserves to be putty in your hands.

  • Fashion Fiesta: Dress Saki-chan in anything from frilly to barely there. Pick her outfits, or don't – the choice is yours. Remember, in Saki-chan's world, less can indeed be more!

Saki-chan's Soothing Sanctuary is where relaxation meets recreation. Whether you're gearing up for another race or just need a place to chill, Saki-chan is ready to... well, let's just say she's ready for you.

Note: This game is for those who believe in the art of relaxation, without the art of clothing, it's 18+ only and no sexual action just yet.Please. Enjoy responsibly!

content_descriptors.notes:
Player can engage with Saki-chan in her relax / massage room: 
- Different suggestive poses for massage.
- Using different tool of massage from hand, tentacle to vibrator.
- Changing Saki-chan clothes or strip her naked.
- There will be no explicit sexual action in the game just naked massage.

name: Saki-chan: Track Of Fury - Massage Mode DLC
short_description: After racing combat, relax with Saki-chan! Use fingers, vibes, or tentacles to massage. Choose poses and outfits, or none at all. No sex or insertion just yet, just suggestive 18+ only.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
